sessions.description: Stores active user sessions, linking a GitHub user to a verified device.

userId.description: The unique ID of the authenticated GitHub user.

githubUsername.description: The GitHub username of the user.

deviceBuildNumber.description: The build number of the device used for the session.

deviceFingerprint.description: The secure fingerprint of the device.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the session was created.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when the session is set to expire.

isActive.description: A flag to indicate if the session is currently active.
